titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation, for the publishing of an Act of Parliament late made for the better ordering and selling of wines by retail, &c.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by John Bill, printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, 1660. At the King's Printing-House in Black-Friers,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at our court at Whitehall, the nineteenth day of March, in the thirteenth year of our reign, one thousand six hundred and sixty.
Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 60; Steele notation: the ses 2) Commis- 3) of Continuance.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
